page.title: 04EVENTS IN FLAMBOROUGH
page.content: In Flamborough we have lots of annual events. In July there is a lifeboat gala held in the Cricket field. We sometimes have shows in the village hall. Some are travelling shows but most of them are our own plays. There is a flower festival in the church. It is held every year at the end of July and there are some lovely flower displays. Afterwards you can go in the church hall to look at the art displays. Sometimes we have other events and things to aid the lifeboat. Every year people dress up as Vikings and pretend to go raiding the village. Then we all meet at Cameron's Fardens and some people make speeches. Then afterwards we go to the vicarage and have a gala.
